Name: Shortbow
Description: Doubles before counter, 3x Mt vs fliers

Name: Chu-ko-nu
Description: x4 attacks, no counter, 3x Mt vs fliers Mag

Name: Sleep
Description: Put an enemy to sleep for 1 turn too

Name: Warp
Description: Send an ally to any square

Name: Rescue
Description: Brings an ally next to the user

Name: Fengyan
Description: Adds luck to dmg/def/res initiating. x2 WT. Auto-repair.

Name: Powder Blast
Description: AoE -33% HP in 3 tiles of target. No x2. Auto-repair.

Name: Guidance
Description: No dmg. Second action after use. Auto-repair.

Name: Jolting John
Description: Hits Res. 3x Mt vs boats. No x2. Auto-repair.

Name: Frying Pan
Description: Reduce chance of being targeted. +4 Spd/Def. Auto-repair.

Name: Crocodile
Description: On kill, act again, full heal, -3 move for 1 turn. Auto-repair. Brave.

Name: Fair Fight
Description: Target Dmg -10 for 1 turn. No x2/crit. Second action after use. Auto-repair.

Name: Feather Fury
Description: Can't counter/be countered. Ranged attacks do 0 damage.

Name: Oren Special
Description: Def/Res +8. +8 Hit per tiled moved. Auto-repair.

Name: Siphon Spear
Description: Spd +5. Drains HP. Uses Mag. Auto-repair.

Name: Dissect
Description: Targets Def. Auto-repair. No x2. Boost Exp. Gain 2 turns +10 Mag (but not Dmg).

Name: Impending Doom
Description: War Ballad Bonus: Adjacent allies +10 Dmg for 1 turn. No x2.

Name: On Swift Wings
Description: War Ballad Bonus: Adjacent allies +5 Speed for 1 turn. No x2.

Name: Unyielding Spirit
Description: War Ballad Bonus: Adjacent allies +5 Def/Res for 1 turn. No x2.

Name: Barrier Bottle
Description: Gives ally +7 Res, reducing by 1 each turn.

Name: Spiritslayer
Description: Survive a lethal attack if HP > 1. Can't miss. Auto-repair.

Name: Chain Hook
Description: Pull an ally next to the user. Auto-repair. Second action after use.

Name: Hailstrike
Description: Hits Def. Can't double/be doubled. Auto-repair.

Name: Futile Struggle
Description: Foe -33% current HP after. No x2. Crescendo bonus: +5 Spd this turn.

Name: Inevitable Fate
Description: Gain +2 Dmg every turn. No x2. Crescendo bonus: +10 dmg this turn.

Name: Prolonged Pain
Description: Drain HP. Add lost HP to Dmg. Crescendo bonus: +5 Def/Res this turn.

Name: Rapid Injector
Description: Heals target for 20. Auto-repair. Second action after use.
